reviewText: It was a burned copy which does not play on professional equipment.
Disappointed, thought this was an exercise video, it is not.....

Fantastic visuals for our party. Our guests really loved it. It got people dancing and kept the party fun. I saw this on several TV shows including Dina's Party where it looked amazing the way she dressed the room. We are for sure going to be keeping this around and looking for more visuals, never knew they could be so much fun. The auto looping feature let the DVD play all night long. It stopped people from ruining the party by putting the tv on to watch sports or worse, 5 stars!

My collection of Shadow Dancer dvds has grown and here is yet another one that I would encourage people to rush out and buy. It has awesome stylized sequences that would really appeal to any lover of music! The concepts in this dvd really create a surreal experience that can thoroughly be enjoyed.

This CD was awesome! I had also bought a disco ball, then played some great 70s music and voila'! here is the secret revealed for a great party. All the girls on the dance floor loved following the shadow dancers moves!

This is the all skate edition, all the girls are clothed in gogo outfits and really know how to dance. Has great energy and colors, lights up the party. When you want to spice things up a little get one of the other titles.
and, BAM!  You've got instant party ambience.  Actually, some of the tunes on this one are pretty good.  But remember, kids, you can always mix in your own music!  That's the beauty of these discs.

this dvd worked out really well at my last shin-dig.  it created a nice 'background vibe' and recieved a positive response from my friends.  nice work. im looking forward to seeing the other new volumes.
